entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Friday 24 March 2023
